DOC.brief_summary: Due soft cuff easily fold impede ProSeal LMA insertion , many tool develop . The aim study investigate efficiency ProSeal LMA insertion guide soft , direct optical Foley airway stylet tool ( FAST ) compare standard introducer-tool ( I-Tool ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness Foley Airway Stylet Tool Proseal LMA Insertion
DOC.criteria: 1. patient American Society Anesthesiologists physical status III 2. age 2065 year 3. require LMA Intubation general anesthesia 4. unlimited mouth open 5. unlimited neck motion 1. mouth open ＜ 3 cm 2. limit neck motion 3 . BMI≧35 kg/m2
